help.info: Computes the invariant subset of the closed-loop system
help.descr: For a closed-loop system, consisting of a system and a controller, this function computes the set of states of the system for which the controller provides recursive satisfaction of system's state and input constraints.

output.name: invset
output.descr: Invariant subset of the closed-loop system as an instance of the Polyhedronclass.
